LightningComponentBundle.description: This allows for dynamic fields rendered as a field section.

property.name: sectionLabel
property.label: Section Label
property.description: Enter the label of this section

property.name: hideSectionLabelOnView
property.label: Hide Section Label on View?
property.description: Set to true to hide the section label when in view mode.

property.name: readOnlyMode
property.label: Set Fields in Read Only mode?
property.description: Set to true to hide the edit pencil icon when in read only mode.

property.name: hideSectionLabelOnEdit
property.label: Hide Section Label on Edit?
property.description: Set to true to hide the section label when in edit mode.

property.name: hideEditHighlighting
property.label: Disable Edit Highlights?
property.description: Set to true to disable highlighting fields that have changed values.

property.name: startInEditMode
property.label: Start in Edit Mode?
property.description: Set to true to set the section to edit mode on load.

property.name: fieldApiNames
property.label: Comma Separated Field API Names
property.description: Enter API names of the fields you would like to use in this layout section. Prepend with '*' to mark as required. Append with '*' to mark as read-only. Insert an extra comma to insert a blank space

property.name: columns
property.label: Number of Columns
property.description: Enter the number of columns for this section

property.name: boundary
property.label: Include Boundary?
property.description: Set to true to include a box around the field section

property.name: labelOverrides
property.label: Field Label Overrides
property.description: JSON Mapping of API name to new field label

property.name: helpTextOverrides
property.label: Help Text Overrides
property.description: JSON Mapping of API name to new help text

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Automatically bind the page's record id to the component variable

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Object Api Name
